Features.title: An Alternative To Trees
Features.text: A installed PhotoBioReactor from day one absorbs CO2 equivalent to 2 Ten Year Old Grown Trees

Features.title: Managed using Ai
Features.text: All parameters are self managed by PBR's using Ai Algorithms . We envision tree alternative - Artifically Intelligent Trees

Features.title: Enegy Positive Urban Aesthetics
Features.text: PBRs are designed so that they are enerygy positive and as well adds to Urban Artistry

Features.title: Expansive Market Potential for Byproduct Opportunities.
Features.text: Potential USD 300 Billion Market Cap for By-Products Produced
